languages.text: {n}Абеляр сводит брови.{/n} "Оставаясь близ гибнущего мира, мы подвергаем себя риску. А ваша жизнь, Лорд-капитан, много ценнее всего Райкада Минорис. Династия фон Валанциус погибнуть не должна! Потому, как ни прискорбно, мы должны оставить идею эвакуации".

{n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Every moment we spend in proximity to a dying world, we are putting ourselves at risk. Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр сводит брови.{/n} "Оставаясь близ гибнущего мира, мы подвергаем себя риску. А ваша жизнь, Лорд-капитан, много ценнее всего Райкада Минорис. Династия фон Валанциус погибнуть не должна! Потому, как ни прискорбно, мы должны оставить идею эвакуации".

Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

{n}Abelard furrows his browns.{/n} "Every moment we spend in proximity to a dying world, we are putting ourselves at risk. Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

{n}Abelard furrows his browns.{/n} "Every moment we spend in proximity to a dying world, we are putting ourselves at risk. Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“我们正在接近一个濒临毁灭的世界。这场旅途的每一刻，我们都会面临危险。舰长大人，您的生命远比整颗小莱卡德星还要宝贵，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝绝对不能灭亡！因此，尽管令人遗憾，但我们必须舍弃一切打算疏散民众的念头。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Every moment we spend in proximity to a dying world, we are putting ourselves at risk. Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“我们正在接近一个濒临毁灭的世界。这场旅途的每一刻，我们都会面临危险。舰长大人，您的生命远比整颗小莱卡德星还要宝贵，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝绝对不能灭亡！因此，尽管令人遗憾，但我们必须舍弃一切打算疏散民众的念头。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは眉をひそめた。{/n}「滅びゆく惑星の近くにいればいるほど、我ら自身も危険にさらされるのです。ロード・キャプテン、そのお命は、ライカド・ミノリスのすべてよりもはるかに貴重です。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が滅びることは許されません！嘆かわしいことではありますが、我々は避難の考えを排除せねばならないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Every moment we spend in proximity to a dying world, we are putting ourselves at risk. Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラードは眉をひそめた。{/n}「滅びゆく惑星の近くにいるほど、我ら自身も危険にさらされているのだ。ロード・キャプテン、あなたの命は、ライカド・ミノリスのすべてよりもはるかに貴重だ。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が滅びることは許されない！嘆かわしいことではあるが、我々は避難の考えを排除せねばならないのだ」
{n}アベラルドは眉をひそめた。{/n}「滅びゆく惑星の近くにいればいるほど、我ら自身も危険にさらされるのです。ロード・キャプテン、そのお命は、ライカド・ミノリスのすべてよりもはるかに貴重です。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が滅びることは許されません！嘆かわしいことではありますが、我々は避難の考えを排除せねばならないのです」

languages.text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Jeden Augenblick, den wir in der Nähe sterbenden Welt verbringen, setzen wir uns einem Risiko aus. Euer Leben, Lord Captain, ist weitaus wertvoller als ganz Rykad Minoris. Die Dynastie von Valancius darf nicht untergehen! Und daher, so bedauernswert das auch ist, müssen wir jede Idee einer Evakuierung ausschließen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Every moment we spend in proximity to a dying world, we are putting ourselves at risk. Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Jeden Augenblick, den wir in der Nähe sterbenden Welt verbringen, setzen wir uns einem Risiko aus. Euer Leben, Lord Captain, ist weitaus wertvoller als ganz Rykad Minoris. Die Dynastie von Valancius darf nicht untergehen! Und daher, so bedauernswert das auch ist, müssen wir jede Idee einer Evakuierung ausschließen."

languages.text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Chaque minute passée à proximité d'un monde mourant nous fait courir un grand risque. Votre vie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, est bien plus importante que celle de Rykad Minoris tout entière. La dynastie von Valancius ne doit pas disparaître ! Voilà pourquoi, aussi regrettable que cela puisse être, l'idée même d'une évacuation est à proscrire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Every moment we spend in proximity to a dying world, we are putting ourselves at risk. Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Chaque minute passée à proximité d'un monde mourant nous fait courir un grand risque. Votre vie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, est bien plus importante que celle de Rykad Minoris tout entière. La dynastie von Valancius ne doit pas disparaître ! Voilà pourquoi, aussi regrettable que cela puisse être, l'idée même d'une évacuation est à proscrire. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Con cada momento que pasamos cerca del mundo moribundo nos exponemos más al peligro. Su vida, Lord Capitán, es más valiosa que Rykad Minoris al completo. ¡No toleraré la muerte de la dinastía von Valancius! Así pues, por lamentable que sea, debemos abandonar la idea de evacuar».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Every moment we spend in proximity to a dying world, we are putting ourselves at risk. Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Con cada momento que pasamos cerca del mundo moribundo nos exponemos más al peligro. Su vida, Lord Capitán, es más valiosa que Rykad Minoris al completo. ¡No toleraré la muerte de la dinastía von Valancius! Así pues, por lamentable que sea, debemos abandonar la idea de evacuar».

languages.text: {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Ölmekte olan bir dünyanın yakınında olduğumuz her an, tehlikeyle burun burunayız. Sizin canınız tüm Rykad Minoris'ten çok daha değerli Lord Kaptan. Von Valancius hanedanlığının helak olmasına izin verilemez! İşte bu yüzden, ne kadar esefle de olsa herhangi bir tahliye fikrini göz ardı etmek durumundayız."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brows.{/n} "Every moment we spend in proximity to a dying world, we are putting ourselves at risk. Your life, Lord Captain, is far more valuable than all of Rykad Minoris. The von Valancius dynasty cannot be allowed to perish! And so, lamentable though it is, we must rule out the idea of any evacuation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Yitmekte olan bir dünyanın yakınında olduğumuz her an, kendimizi riske atıyoruz. Sizin hayatınız tüm Rykad Minoris'ten çok daha değerli Lord Kaptan. Von Valancius hanedanlığının helak olmasına izin verilemez! İşte bu yüzden, ne kadar esefle de olsa herhangi bir tahliye fikrini göz ardı etmeliyiz."
